backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides pre-written summaries describing purpose and behavior of multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app and linking the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages including the new /tos route.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering TopNav, page content via Outlet, Discord CTA, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Discor: Displays a Discord promo card with icon, text, and external join button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FAQSec: Renders FAQ accordion items sourced from marketingContent within animated section shell.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Shows a grid of marketing feature bubbles with hover animation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FinalC: Final call‑to‑action block with headline, subheadline, and two navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with brand logo, product/company links, and social icons using marketingContent.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with headline, subheadline, and CTA button linking to /plans.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Motion: Animates child elements into view using IntersectionObserver with optional delay and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Renders the pricing section with animated plan cards, images, and optional Buy Now links using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Wraps sections with consistent padding, container layout, and optional ID.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Displays testimonials in a grid with animated entry and styled quote cards from marketing content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TopNav: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with scroll behavior, desktop and mobile menus, and CTA button.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Provides static marketing content including navigation, hero text, features, testimonials, and pricing plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that no backend queries exist and all content is static.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes plus base styles and gradient text utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with marketing content, animated sections, and icon‑based cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage using hero, features, social proof, CTA, and FAQ sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Builds the main marketing landing page with navigation, multiple sections, and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/MorePage.tsx: Placeholder page displaying a simple heading and message for future content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentMethodPage.tsx: Displays payment methods, conditions, and security info using marketing content and animated cards.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Shows the pricing section with a buy‑now link.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewPage.tsx: Shows the social proof section inside a padded layout.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders the Terms of Service content in multiple animated card sections with icons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, animations, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature statuses, and requirements tracking info.
